JobFullDesc: The Global People Operations team aims to create and deliver a seamless, positive and efficient experience across the employee lifecycle. Within People Ops is the HR Tech team, which focuses primarily on facilitating optimal solutions across the internal information ecosystem. HR Tech is a multidisciplinary team of experts spanning content strategy, enterprise content management, system & solution design, enterprise architecture, and data & analytics. This team partners most closely with Engineering, product managers, UX researchers, and strategic teams that represent various operational processes and programs across the HR business.To round out the team and realize the vision of a more innovative and integrated employee support experience, we’re looking for an expert in the domain of conversational AI, especially as it pertains to compassionate customer support, workflow integration opportunities, and scalable self-service.
